comments.author: Dave
comments.body: As my orthopedist hacked his way toward his April boat payment on Monday, he took some great pics of the festivities. He told me his aim was to clear away all the junk that was crushing my ACl and had been making me walk like a duck. As the evidence shows, he may have gotten a little carried away; he was headed north at an alarming rate. He told me later that the microgrinder is so darn much fun it's just hard to stop sometimes. Don't click on this if you're squeamish (Steve). [How to make $5000 in forty-five minutes](https://webfiles.colorado.edu/underwod/www/stuff/knee.jpg) Actually, my doctor is great, a saint even, and I'm all better. If, God forbid, you ever need a knee job, let me know and I'll give you his name. A whispered aside: I get a free set of steak knives w/ every referral. DU
